typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		CodProd as string,
		Name as string,
		Valor as decimal(19,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SAintProdutosTbl
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		CodProd as string,
		Name as string,
		Valor as decimal(19,4),
		DT_Creation as date,
		DT_Inicio as date,
		DT_Fim as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SAProdutosTbl
NomearColunas sort(asc(CodProdintSA, true)) ~> SortCodProd
NomerColunas sort(asc(CodProdSA, true)) ~> SortCodProdSA
SortCodProd, SortCodProdSA join(CodProdintSA == CodProdSA,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MergeJoin
MergeJoin split(isNull(CodProdSA),
	disjoint: false) ~> DivCondicional@(NovosRegistros, ModificarRegistros)
DivCondicional@NovosRegistros derive(DT_CreationNR = toDate(currentUTC()),
		DT_InicioNR = toDate(currentUTC())) ~> CriarDatasNR
DivCondicional@ModificarRegistros, SortCodProdSA exists(CodProdintSA == NomerColunas@CodProdSA &&
(
    NameintSA != NomerColunas@NameSA ||

    ValorintSA != ValorintSA 


),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExisteBranch
ExisteBranch derive(DT_InicioAtivacao = toDate(currentUTC())) ~> CriarDataAtivacao
InactiveFields alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateInactive
ExisteBranch derive(DT_Fim_Inactive = toDate(currentUTC())) ~> InactiveFields
SAProdutosTbl select(mapColumn(
		IdSA = Id,
		CodProdSA = CodProd,
		NameSA = Name,
		ValorSA = Valor,
		DT_CreationSA = DT_Creation,
		DT_InicioSA = DT_Inicio,
		DT_FimSA = DT_Fim
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NomerColunas
SAintProdutosTbl select(mapColumn(
		IdintSA = Id,
		CodProdintSA = CodProd,
		NameintSA = Name,
		ValorintSA = Valor
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NomearColunas
CriarDatasNR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		CodProd as string,
		Name as string,
		Valor as decimal(19,4),
		DT_Creation as date,
		DT_Inicio as date,
		DT_Fim as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		CodProd = CodProdintSA,
		Name = CodProdintSA,
		Valor = ValorintSA,
		DT_Creation = DT_CreationNR,
		DT_Inicio = DT_InicioNR
	)) ~> SAProdutosIns
CriarDataAtivacao sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		CodProd as string,
		Name as string,
		Valor as decimal(19,4),
		DT_Creation as date,
		DT_Inicio as date,
		DT_Fim as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		CodProd = CodProdintSA,
		Name = NameintSA,
		Valor = ValorintSA,
		DT_Inicio = DT_InicioAtivacao
	)) ~> SAProdutosInsUpdate
UpdateInactive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		CodProd as string,
		Name as string,
		Valor as decimal(19,4),
		DT_Creation as date,
		DT_Inicio as date,
		DT_Fim as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Id = IdSA,
		CodProd = CodProdSA,
		Name = NameSA,
		Valor = ValorSA,
		DT_Fim = DT_Fim_Inactive
	)) ~> SAProdutosInativos
